newsitem.title: USA: Unmanned cargo craft hits Mir station, NASA.
newsitem.headline: Unmanned cargo craft hits Mir station, NASA.

text.p: A U.S. astronaut and two Russian cosmonauts were unhurt after an unmanned cargo craft crashed into the Russian Mir space station Mir earlier on Wednesday, NASA officials said.

The Progress cargo craft, which was scheduled to redock with Mir after flying free of the station for a day, struck one of the station's modules causing a loss of air pressure. The crew were able to seal off the damaged compartment, said NASA spokesman Doug Ward.
